DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective observational trial on reasons for withdraw of Adjuvant Tamoxifen in Breast Cancer patients
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Observational Trial on Reasons for Withdraw of Adjuvant Tamoxifen in Breast Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: Breast Ca Patients with surgery and withdraw of adjuvant treatment with Tamoxifen for Tam related AEs Documented reasons for treatment withdrawal enrollment in other studies treatment withdraw for other causes than Tam related AEs
